Calculate adjusted rand index for harmonized clusters

Source: R/clustering.R
getARI.Rd

Calculate adjusted rand index for harmonized clusters

getARI(bank, digits = 3)

Arguments

bank

BanksyObject with harmonized clusters

digits

number of digits to round ARI to

Value

matrix of ARI

Examples

# Generate a simulated dataset
d <- simulateDataset()
bank <- BanksyObject(own.expr = d$gcm, cell.locs = d$locs, meta.data = d$meta)
bank <- NormalizeBanksy(bank)
bank <- ScaleBanksy(bank)
bank <- ComputeBanksy(bank)
#> Computing neighbors...
#> Computing neighbor matrix...
#> Done
bank <- RunPCA(bank, lambda = 0.2)
#> Running PCA for lambda=0.2
bank <- ClusterBanksy(bank, lambda = 0.2, npcs = 20, k.neighbors = 50, resolution = c(0.5,1.5))
#> Iteration 1 out of 2
#> Iteration 2 out of 2
ari <- getARI(bank)
ari
#>                         clust_lam0.2_k50_res0.5 clust_lam0.2_k50_res1.5
#> clust_lam0.2_k50_res0.5                   1.000                   0.248
#> clust_lam0.2_k50_res1.5                   0.248                   1.000
